channel.title: What kind of server does the majority Really want?
channel.description:
hey guys im just trying to figure out -what players of RSC want as a Server?
I have a Pking Server out that players wanted and it seems there is a low player count. I' am just trying to see what players of Runescape Classic WAnt. Please post, so we can get a Server Done... I think The Pk Server That I Currently have up is great... fast fun and Easy...

item.title: What kind of server does the majority Really want?
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

I feel like this isn’t worthy of an argument.

Read full topic
item.source: What kind of server does the majority Really want?

item.title: What kind of server does the majority Really want?
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“matty matt, post:14, topic:532305”][quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=651095.msg4369994#msg4369994 date=1380403610]

There is no such thing as ‘RS1’ LOL

yes there is fudgetard… grow up and get a life
[/quote]You’re wrong.

iam right. I played when runescape classic was the original game… then rs2 was a 3d version that was coming out… implying that the old version is rs1… now they are coming out with rs3… how do u not see that… ne ways…[/quote]Because it’s RSC, not RS1. The only time Jagex called it RS1 was when RS2 was in development and it would be confusing if they just said RuneScape. On the official release, they changed it from RS1 or just RS to RSC, and from RS2 to RS. Pretty much everyone still calls it RS2 though, and I’m sure it will continued to be called that seeing RS3 was already released. Also, I haven’t seen anything changing it from RS2 to anything else, and RS3 to RS.

Read full topic
item.source: What kind of server does the majority Really want?

item.title: What kind of server does the majority Really want?
item.dc:creator: @matty_matt matty matt
item.description:
@matty_matt wrote:

[quote=“CodeForFame, post:13, topic:532305”][quote author=matty matt link=topic=651095.msg4369978#msg4369978 date=1380401068]

There is no such thing as ‘RS1’ LOL

yes there is fudgetard… grow up and get a life
[/quote]You’re wrong.[/quote]
iam right. I played when runescape classic was the original game… then rs2 was a 3d version that was coming out… implying that the old version is rs1… now they are coming out with rs3… how do u not see that… ne ways…

latifundio:

Maybe the majority of a small group of rsc players is not that big. Maybe 4-5 years ago you would have a lot of players but now… nope.

i agree with this and that the game rsc is dead unless jagex brings it back for free players…

Read full topic

item.title: What kind of server does the majority Really want?
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“nolan2131, post:7, topic:532305”]I’ve wondered this for a long time. I’ve realized that it just varies and is opinionated; some people like PK servers, others like skilling servers, others like all around, whilst some people hate PK servers, others hate skilling servers, and others hate all around. People on Soulsplit might hate the idea of 24-7 PK on Fatality, while people on Fatality might hate the all around experience on Soulsplit. It’s split down the middle in my opinion.[/quote]Go back to the RS2 section…

Read full topic
item.source: What kind of server does the majority Really want?

item.title: What kind of server does the majority Really want?
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

I’ve wondered this for a long time. I’ve realized that it just varies and is opinionated; some people like PK servers, others like skilling servers, others like all around, whilst some people hate PK servers, others hate skilling servers, and others hate all around. People on Soulsplit might hate the idea of 24-7 PK on Fatality, while people on Fatality might hate the all around experience on Soulsplit. It’s split down the middle in my opinion.

Read full topic
